mapper.select: select h.* ,ty.* from tb_hospital h INNER JOIN tr_hospital_department de on de.hospital_id = h.hospital_id LEFT JOIN tr_hospital_type ty on ty.hospital_id = h.hospital_id where h.hospital_city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and de.department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and de.`status` = '0' and ty.`status` = '0' and h.`status`='0'
select h.* from tr_department_doctor a left join tb_hospital h on h.hospital_id = a.hospital_id where a.doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.deleted = '0'
